attributes.action: propose legislation on reducing income tax to below 1% for incomes >15k - 2.5%>30k - 5%>50k - 10%>100k - 20%>150k - 30% 150k>
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the country pays taxes on every item purchased or service used,the need to reduce the tax on income would bring daylight to the glooming scenario of the currant financial affairs.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
